Text: Do consider buying the bundle than just downloading it here(unless you already bought it), I mean, you can choose $0.01, and there are charities that the money goes to(if you choose it to go to them)!
Happy this is here saves their bandwidth and collects everything I need from my purchase =)

I just bought the bundle.
Support indie DRM-Free games!
just go buy it for a penny or something.
Can some one buy this Bundle for me? Please please! PayPal doesn't support my country and I don't have credit cards. I would love to buy this but I can't. Can you spare a penny for me?
@goombapatrol: please don't do that. It will probably cost them more in bandwidth and other fees. Just torrent if if you aren't willing to give at least a dollar or even 50 cents.

I paid $5, I know it's way below the worth of the games... but as a student i can only do so much

If you guys do buy it, go for like above $3, if you're going well, $15, if you are a demigod, $29.

point is, use this torrent as a backup rather than a way to pirate it, resist the urge and pay the awesome developers and charities
